name: openid.connect.token
desc: Exchanges a temporary OAuth verifier code for an access token for Sign in with Slack.

client_id.desc: Issued when you created your application.

client_secret.desc: Issued when you created your application.

code.desc: The `code` param returned via the OAuth callback.

grant_type.desc: The `grant_type` param as described in the OAuth spec.

redirect_uri.desc: This must match the originally submitted URI (if one was sent).

refresh_token.desc: The `refresh_token` param as described in the OAuth spec.

errors.bad_client_secret: The value passed for `client_secret` was invalid.
errors.bad_redirect_uri: The value passed for `redirect_uri` did not match the `redirect_uri` in the original request.
errors.cannot_install_an_org_installed_app: An org-installed app cannot be installed on a workspace.
errors.invalid_grant_type: The value passed for `grant_type` was invalid.
errors.invalid_client_id: The value passed for `client_id` was invalid.
errors.invalid_code: The value passed for `code` was invalid.
errors.invalid_refresh_token: The given refresh token is invalid.
errors.oauth_authorization_url_mismatch: The OAuth flow was initiated on an incorrect version of the authorization URL. The flow must be initiated via /openid/connect/authorize .
errors.preview_feature_not_available: The API method is not yet available on the team.
